column4: hi, i'm on 9.10 now, can't get any usb mice to work. thumbdrives are working fine, only mice are causing trouble. what's the problem?
that's weird, try running:  sudo lsusb   which should tell you what ubuntu sees connected to your usb ports
ubuntu seems to recognize my mice. it's in the list.
I don't have much experience with x input devices (unless it's a wiimote) :s
